title: 1.5 A Unit Vector
description: In this video, I explain the concept of a “unit vector,” what it means to “normalize” a vector, and take a look at the p5.js functions: p5.Vector.mag(), p5.Vector.normalize(), p5.Vector.setMag().

timestamps.title: Welcome to another video about vectors!
Normalizing a vector by dividing by magnitude
Source code for the normalize function
See you in the next video!

codeExamples.title: Unit Vector (Normalize)
codeExamples.description: Creates a unit vector that points at the mouse
